creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure mid-stride, holding a sword down with both hands and looking behind him, up at an owl flying near a tree; disembodied head near PR foot; image is framed by a tree on either side
marks: top edge, in plate: It was the owl that shriek\'d,  signed bottom margin, in print: G. Richmond / Delt
title: The Fatal Bellman
